title: 8-11  Using the trigonometric functions
description:
Print the following table to display the sin value and cos value of degrees from 0 to 360 with increments of 10 degrees. 
You should set the width of print field of each column to 12, set the precision of floating-point numbers to 4 and fixed, justify the output to the right.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: Note that the function double sin(double x) and double cos(double x) return the  sin/cos value of an angle of x radians.
